page.title: 05Darlington Garden Fete
page.content:
{St Teresa's Garden Fete}takes place very year. The weather wasn't all that good this year. We were surprised when a lot of people came. There was a bouncy castle, rifle shoot, darts, golf, bowls, animal croquet and lots of different stalls. Bingo was played inside the nursery. The coconut-shy also was a large attraction,and many coconuts were won.
{Jimmy Montgomery,}the famous goalkeeper, came to open the garden fete. Hot dogs, chips, sweets and drinks were on sale. Raffles were held with prizes such as a video, a patio set and 2 watches. Although the weather was bad the number of people that came was enormous. Jazz bands came and played music. The money was for St Teresa's church and school.{ { Stephen Dickson}
